text: Otto Mueller (December 19, 1875 - January 9, 1973) was an American Republican politician and businessman from Wisconsin. ==Career== Born in Wausau, Wisconsin, Mueller was a jeweler in Wausau. He served on the Marathon County, Wisconsin Board of Supervisors. He served in the Wisconsin State Senate 1927-1933 and 1939–1941.'Wisconsin Blue Book 1940,' Biographical Sketch of Otto Mueller, pg. 33 ==Recall election== In 1932, Mueller survived a recall election.Recall Election ==Notes== Category:Politicians from Wausau, Wisconsin Category:Businesspeople from Wisconsin Category:Wisconsin Republicans Category:Wisconsin state senators Category:County supervisors in Wisconsin Category:American jewellers Category:1875 births Category:1973 deaths
title: Otto Mueller (politician)
